<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs=""
>
[Magic Wand](/Equipment.aspx?ID=368)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 597 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This baton is about a foot long and contains a single spell. The appearance typically relates to the spell within.

<document level="2" id="action-202" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply a listed-level casting of the spell.
